alert.note: Alert for Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 10 at 12:47PM PST until March 10 at 5:45PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest California, including the following county, Ventura. * WHEN...Until 700 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1244 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated moderate to occasionally heavy rain overspreading the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, as the rain continues through the afternoon and into the evening. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oxnard, Thousand Oaks, Simi Valley, Ventura, Camarillo, Fillmore, Ojai, Chatsworth, Moorpark, Santa Paula, Port Hueneme, Rose Valley, Ventura Harbor, Newbury Park, and Point Mugu. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
